page.title: 14F of D Berry Hill My Day
page.content: This morning I got up at{8.30}am.I made myself a{cup of tea}and sat down for a while and watched{television. Then{Dad}came in.He asked if I would like to help him{work}on the house.I said,"yes please,"and went outside to see what{Dad}wanted me to do.He gave me a{wire brush}and some{sandpaper.Dad told me to prepare the front gates for painting.I had to get the gates really smooth and make sure I rubbed all the flaking paint off before I could{paint {them.Mum}was at work so I made dinner. I put{three pasties}in the{microwave {oven.It took five minutes.As soon as I {had finished dinner I started painting {the gates.It took me until tea time. For tea we had{beef,carrots,peas,and new{potatoes.After I played football {for a quarter of an hour with my {brother and then we watched television {until supper time.
